pageTitle: Footasylum Virtual Gift Card (From £10 to £300) | Virtual | Footasylum
textBeforeTable: Mens Footwear Please use the tables below to find your size. These are only a guide, and may not be accurate as sizes do vary between brands. For example, G-Star are usually a small fitting and so if you have not tried their clothing before, we recommend you buy a size up from your regular size. Footwear All footwear sizes displayed on our website are UK sizes, however some products may display EU sizes on the box or shoe itself. European scales do not exactly match UK scales and may vary from brand to brand. Please make sure that you enter the email address of your chosen recipient carefully. You will also receive an acknowledgement email to let you know that it has been sent to them. Both emails will be sent from orders@footasylum-mail.co.uk. Each order placed will be security checked prior to the email being sent tothe recipient. If there are any problems, you will be notified by email. To redeem the voucher online, simply enter the card number and the pinnumber from the email at checkout. Please note that the voucher cannot be redeemed on our mobile site or iPhone app. To redeem in one of our high street stores, simply print out the email containing the card number and hand over at
